department.dept_long_name: Department of Germanic Languages and Literatures

course.title: Nietzsche
course.description: Readings and discussions of Nietzsche's major works (in translation), including The Birth of Tragedy, Untimely Meditations, Human, All Too Human, The Gay Science, Thus Spoke Zarathustra, Beyond Good and Evil, The Genealogy of Morals, Twilight of the Idols, The Antichrist, and Ecce Homo.
course.notes: No knowledge of German required. All readings and discussions in English.
